mapper.sql: ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID, ORDER_LINE, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, SEAT_CODE, SEAT_VAL, SEAT_STATUS
mapper.insert: insert into cms_activity_order_detail (ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID, ORDER_LINE, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, SEAT_CODE, SEAT_VAL, SEAT_STATUS) values (#{activityOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderLine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into cms_activity_order_detail
ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID,
ORDER_LINE,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATE_USER,
SEAT_CODE,
SEAT_VAL,
SEAT_STATUS,
#{activityOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderLine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{seatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{seatVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{seatStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update cms_activity_order_detail
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEAT_CODE = #{seatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEAT_VAL = #{seatVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEAT_STATUS = #{seatStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID = #{activityOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ORDER_LINE = #{orderLine,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM cms_activity_order_detail a LEFT JOIN cms_activity_order b ON a.ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID =b.ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID WHERE b.EVENT_ID = #{eventId} AND a.SEAT_STATUS IN (1, 3, 4) AND b.ORDER_PAY_STATUS!=2
